cards.name: Jon Snow
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Jon Snow is participating, either: stand each attacking Wildling character, or stand each defending [thenightswatch] character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Bowen Marsh
cards.text: During [intrigue] challenges, each Steward character you control gains insight. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: Old Bear Mormont
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Old Bear Mormont is participating, choose a non-unique character in the losing opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control.

cards.name: Cotter Pyke
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After Cotter Pyke bypasses a character using stealth, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, choose a [thenightswatch] character and have it gain stealth until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Maester Aemon
cards.text: No attachments except Item. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent and a challenge type that has not been initiated against you this phase. That player must satisfy the claim of that challenge type as if you were the winning opponent.

cards.name: Grizzled Miner
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reduce the cost to marshal Grizzled Miner by 1 for each [thenightswatch] attachment and location you control (to a minimum of 1).

cards.name: Ser Denys Mallister
cards.text: While Ser Denys Mallister is defending, he gains renown.

cards.name: Ser Jaremy Rykker
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Each other Ranger character you control gains a [power] icon.

cards.name: Castle Black Mason
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Action: Kneel 2 Builder characters to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a location or attachment, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Grenn
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Grenn is attacking, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to another attacking [thenightswatch] character. (Up to 2 power instead if that character is standing.)

cards.name: Pyp
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Pyp is attacking, choose another attacking [thenightswatch] character. That character gains insight until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Samwell Tarly
cards.text: While Samwell Tarly is participating in a challenge, treat each other participating non-Steward character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Satin
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Satin is knelt, choose and stand another Steward character. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Lost Ranger
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you control no other Ranger characters, sacrifice Lost Ranger.

cards.name: Seasoned Woodsman
cards.text: Reaction: After you attach an attachment to Seasoned Woodsman, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Builder at the Wall
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Builder at the Wall to reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] attachment or location you marshal this phase by 1.

cards.name: The New Gift
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel a Steward character to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.) Challenges Action: Kneel a Steward character to draw 1 card. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Abandoned Stronghold
cards.text: Action: Kneel Abandoned Stronghold to choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of Builder characters you control.

cards.name: Queenscrown
cards.text: Action: Kneel Queenscrown to reveal the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck. Choose up to 1 character revealed this way and place it in that player's discard pile. Place the other cards on the bottom of that player's deck in any order.

cards.name: Catapult on the Wall
cards.text: Action: Kneel Catapult on the Wall and attached character to choose and kill an attacking character with STR 4 or lower. Attached character cannot stand during the standing phase this round.

cards.name: Ghost
cards.text: [thenightswatch] or [stark] character only. Interrupt: When attached character would be killed, return Ghost to your hand to save that character.

cards.name: Sworn to the Watch
cards.text: Attached character gains the [thenightswatch] affiliation. While attached character has: - a [military] icon, it gains the Ranger trait. - an [intrigue] icon, it gains the Steward trait. - a [power] icon, it gains the Builder trait.

cards.name: Now My Watch Begins
cards.text: Reaction: After a character with printed cost 5 or lower is placed in an opponent's discard pile, put that character into play under your control.

cards.name: I Shall Win No Glory
cards.text: Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, kneel 3 Builder characters, 3 Ranger characters, or 3 Steward characters to end the challenge immediately with no winner or loser.

cards.name: Marya Seaworth
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is bypassed using stealth, pay 1 gold to kneel it. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Black Betha
cards.text: While you control Ser Davos Seaworth, he gains renown. Action: Kneel Black Betha to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +X STR. X is the number of kneeling characters the defending player controls.

cards.name: Salt Wife
cards.text: Challenges Action: Sacrifice Salt Wife to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as a defender.

cards.name: Raiding the Bay of Ice
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, kneel a Warship location to choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent, and place it on top of its owner's deck.

cards.name: Ulf Son of Umar
cards.text: Reaction: After a Clansman character enters play under your control, Ulf Son of Umar gets +X STR until the end of the phase. X is that character's printed STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: There Are No Men Like Me
cards.text: Action: Choose a Knight character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel when declared as an attacker or defender in a [military] challenge.

cards.name: Southron Messenger
cards.text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Southron Messenger enters play during a challenge, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons, and return that character to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Lingering Venom
cards.text: Terminal. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, place a venom token on Lingering Venom. Then, if attached character's STR is equal to or lower than the number of venom tokens on Lingering Venom, kill it.

cards.name: Jeyne Poole
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Sacrifice Jeyne Poole to return a Lady character from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Summer
cards.text: Unique [stark] character only. Action: Kneel attached character to have it participate in a [military] challenge on your side. (Limit once per challenge.) Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Summer to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Dothraki Honor Guard
cards.text:
No attachments.
Dothraki Honor Guard gets -1 STR for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Plaza of Pride
cards.text: Action: Kneel Plaza of Pride and discard a card from your hand to choose and stand a character with printed cost X or lower. X is 3 higher than the printed cost of the discarded card.

cards.name: Ser Jon Fossoway
cards.text: While Ser Jon Fossoway's STR is 5 or higher, he gains renown.

cards.name: The Honeywine
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, The Honeywine gains 1 power.

cards.name: Rattleshirt
cards.text: While Rattleshirt is attacking alone, each character without attachments cannot be declared as a defender.

cards.name: Dalla
cards.text: Reaction: After a Wildling character enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Crow Killers
cards.text: Crow Killers does not kneel when declared as an attacker against an opponent whose reserve value is higher than yours.

cards.name: The Frozen Shore
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel The Frozen Shore to choose and stand 1 attacking Wildling character for each Winter plot card revealed.

cards.name: Weirwood Bow
cards.text: [thenightswatch] or Wildling character only. Action: Kneel Weirwood Bow to choose a defending character. That character gets -2 STR until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Scaling the Wall
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Wildling character, choose a non-limited location controlled by the losing opponent. Return that location to its owner's hand.

cards.name: "The Last of the Giants"
cards.text: Action: Put a neutral character into play from your hand. Until the end of the phase, that character gains intimidate. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

cards.name: The Fire That Burns
cards.text: Each [thenightswatch] character you control does not kneel when declared as a defender.

cards.name: Retaliation
cards.text: If you win initiative, you must choose an opponent to be the first player.

cards.name: Whisper Campaign
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After a character without an [intrigue] icon enters play, kneel it.

cards.name: Called Into Service
cards.text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a character, put it into play. If it is a non-character card, draw it and gain 2 gold.

cards.name: The White Shadows
cards.text: Reaction: After a character an opponent controls is killed, put it into play under your control. While that character is in play, treat its printed text box as if it were blank. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, place it in its owner's dead pile (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Name Day Tourney
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a Knight character you control is attacking or defending alone, choose a Lord or Lady character you control and have it gain 1 power.

cards.name: Frozen Expanse
cards.text: Each character with STR 2 or lower cannot stand.
